<a id="StyleBoxLine"></a>

# StyleBoxLine

**Inherits:** [StyleBox](StyleBox.md) **\<** [Resource](Resource.md) **\<** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

A [StyleBox](StyleBox.md) that displays a single line of a given color and thickness.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

A [StyleBox](StyleBox.md) that displays a single line of a given color and thickness. The line can be either horizontal or vertical. Useful for separators.

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->

## Property Descriptions

<a id="StyleBoxLine_property_color"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[Color](Color.md) **color** = `Color(0, 0, 0, 1)` [ðŸ”—](#StyleBoxLine_property_color)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_color**\ (\ value\: [Color](Color.md)\ )
- [Color](Color.md) **get_color**\ (\ )

The line's color.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="StyleBoxLine_property_grow_begin"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](float.md) **grow_begin** = `1.0` [ðŸ”—](#StyleBoxLine_property_grow_begin)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_grow_begin**\ (\ value\: [float](float.md)\ )
- [float](float.md) **get_grow_begin**\ (\ )

The number of pixels the line will extend before the **StyleBoxLine**'s bounds. If set to a negative value, the line will begin inside the **StyleBoxLine**'s bounds.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="StyleBoxLine_property_grow_end"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](float.md) **grow_end** = `1.0` [ðŸ”—](#StyleBoxLine_property_grow_end)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_grow_end**\ (\ value\: [float](float.md)\ )
- [float](float.md) **get_grow_end**\ (\ )

The number of pixels the line will extend past the **StyleBoxLine**'s bounds. If set to a negative value, the line will end inside the **StyleBoxLine**'s bounds.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="StyleBoxLine_property_thickness"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[int](int.md) **thickness** = `1` [ðŸ”—](#StyleBoxLine_property_thickness)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_thickness**\ (\ value\: [int](int.md)\ )
- [int](int.md) **get_thickness**\ (\ )

The line's thickness in pixels.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="StyleBoxLine_property_vertical"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](bool.md) **vertical** = `false` [ðŸ”—](#StyleBoxLine_property_vertical)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_vertical**\ (\ value\: [bool](bool.md)\ )
- [bool](bool.md) **is_vertical**\ (\ )

If ``true``, the line will be vertical. If ``false``, the line will be horizontal.
